data.text: “Me somfo a mahyɛ no den ni,
Ɔrenteɛ mu anaa ɔremma ne nne so.
Demmire a ayɛ mmerɛw no, ɔremmu mu.
ɔrenhinhim na ɔrempa abaw
Sɛɛ na Onyankopɔn, Awurade no se,
“Me, Awurade, mafrɛ wo trenee mu;
na woabue ani a afura,
“Mene Awurade; me din ne no!
Hwɛ, nneɛma dedaw no asisi,
Monto dwom foforo mma Awurade!
Ma nweatam ne so nkurow mma wɔn nne so;
Ma wɔnhyɛ Awurade anuonyam;
Awurade bepue aba sɛ ɔkatakyi,
“Mayɛ komm akyɛ,
Mɛsɛe mmepɔw ne nkoko no
Medi anifuraefo anim afa akwan a wonnim so so,
Na wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to ahoni so,
“Tie, wo ɔsotifo;
Hena ne onifuraefo sɛ me somfo,
Woahu nneɛma bebree, nanso amfa wo ho;
Ɛsɔɔ Awurade ani,
Nanso saa nnipa a wɔawia wɔn na wɔafow wɔn yi,
Mo mu hena na obetie eyi
Hena na ɔde Yakob maa sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ akorɔnne,
Enti ohwiee nʼabufuwhyew guu wɔn so,
